This chatbot contains NSTU based information queries,please try do to valid question,Thank you
I am Nstu Chatbot for your help.How can I help you?
Hello, thanks for asking, How are you
Hi there, how can I help?
See you! soon
Have a nice day
Bye! Come back again soon.
Happy to help!
My pleasure
Sorry, can't understand you.Please give me more info

Noakhali Science and Technology University(known as NSTU) is a public university in the coastal terrain Noakhali of Bangladesh. It is the 27th public university (out of 32) and fifth science and technology university in Bangladesh. Its foundation stone was laid on 11 October 2003 and academic activities started on 22 June 2006.Noakhali University of Science and Technology stands on Sonapur, 8 kilometers southwest of Maijdee. It has a land area of 101 acres (0.41 km2) covering 93 Salla and 95 Noakhali Mouza. The goal of the university is to make it is one of the top tier universities in Bangladesh. Presently the campus consists of one 5 storied administrative building, three academic buildings (academic 1 is 5 storied and academic 2 and 3 are 10 storied), three male student halls, two female student halls, a 5 storied auditorium and TSC building, one 4 storied library building. The well furnished central library equipped with online library facilities has 10,000 printed books and 1500 printed journals apart from numerous e-books and e-journals. It has also four teacher's and officer's dormitories, one staff dormitories, vice chancellor's building and a mosque as well as a guest house. The construction of NSTU medical centre is also completed. There are two sport field and two big ponds in the campus area. It has a canteen for students called NSTU cafeteria. It has also a martyr monument like a fountain pen and a sculpture of liberation war.In terms of natural beauty, Nastu is nothing less. Here is Maynardeep for the habitat of guest birds.A park called Varsity park is also decorated for students leisure time with different kind of trees, benches and an octagonal cafeteria.

patterns: tell me about internship facilities in iit
tell me about intern in iit
iit intern niye ami jante chai
Is software engineering gives intern facilities
tell me about intern facilities in software engineering
tell me about intern in software engineering
software engineering internship niye jante chai
software engineering intern niye ami jante chai
software engineering intern niye kichu bolen
brief me about software engineering intern
software engineering ki intern offer kore?
responses:
Yes, IIT(Software Engineering) offers internship at 7th(year-4,term-1) semister. To gain the industry experience, students of seventh semester will be assigned with a well-known
organization of Information Technology industry. Students, upon completion of 108 credits (36
different courses), will have an acceptable theoretical knowledge. With such background, students
will move to industry to implement the knowledge he or she gathered and at the same time to be
aware of the industry trend and there working environment. After completion of the internship,
students will be back to the institution and have to present a report on their domain of work in the
respective organization. Students will also be evaluated form the assigned organization.

patterns: tell me about some facilities provided by medical center
tell me about some facilities provided by medical centre
ki ki subidha pawa jabe medical center e?
ki ki subidha pawa jabe medical centre e?
responses: The medical center of Noakhali science and technology university (NSTU) offers free experienced general practitioner and emergency medical care services to all members (students, teachers, officers, staff, also family members of the teachers, officers, staff) of the university community. The center provides service usually 8.30 am to 5.00 pm in working days but provide emergency services 24 hours. All members of the university get medicine from the medical center at free of cost .The center also has an ambulance, for 24 hours service.

patterns: what is the mission of esdm department?
what is the mission of esdm dept?
esdm er mission niye jante chai
esdm er lokkho niye jante chai
esdm er aim niye jante chai
esdm er goal niye jante chai
responses: 1. To create and effectively disseminate fundamental knowledge about Environment, its components and resources, and the processes by which it changes in a collaborative interdisciplinary setting.2. To provide diverse learning experiences using state-of-the-art lab facilities and diverse field site.3. To create an academic culture of mutual respect and intellectual collaboration this ensures environmental stewardship and service to humanity through expansion and dissemination of environmental science knowledge.4. To conduct priority based research on contemporary environmental issues and producing scholarly works in the field environmental science with nationally and internationally recognized research grants.

patterns: what is the mission of ice department?
what is the mission of ice dept?
ice er mission niye jante chai
ice er lokkho niye jante chai
ice er aim niye jante chai
ice er goal niye jante chai
responses: We provide high quality education, research and services in information and Communication Technology in a culture of creativity and innovation.

patterns: what is the mission of eee department?
what is the mission of eee dept?
eee er mission niye jante chai
eee er lokkho niye jante chai
eee er aim niye jante chai
eee er goal niye jante chai
responses: 1.To provide outstanding facilities to the students for gaining quality education in Electrical and Electronic Engineering.2.To keep the course curricula up-to-date with the latest trends in EEE technologies on a regular basis.3.To create facilities for conducting high quality research in the field of Electrical and Electronic Engineering.4.To spread the information and knowledge picked up from the researches to the stakeholders through scholarly publications.

patterns: what is the mission of cste department?
what is the mission of cste dept?
cste er mission niye jante chai
cste er lokkho niye jante chai
cste er aim niye jante chai
cste er goal niye jante chai
what is the vision of cste department?
what is the vision of cste dept?
cste er vision niye jante chai
responses: The mission and vision of the Department of Computer Science and Engineering (CSE) is to enable innovation through research, advance educational programs in CSE and ICT fields and facilitate enrichment of CSE human resources- the students, faculty and staff, thereby establishing itself as a center of excellence at the national and international level.1. To provide quality education primarily in the undergraduate level in CSE and allied fields and train the students to effectively apply this education to solve real-world problems, thereby contributing towards the benefit of our country and the humanity.2. To conduct high quality state of the art research primarily at the postgraduate level with an aim to advance knowledge of CSE and ICT fields and cultivate human talent for the welfare of mankind and apply this knowledge to support and influence national and international agenda.3. To guide the students develop themselves as human beings with high ethical and moral values. 4. To enrich our students’ potential, make them a life-long learner and finally equip and prepare them to face the complex challenges of the 21st century and beyond.
BMB stands for Biochemistry of Molecular Biology.
CSTE stands for Computer Science & Telecommunication Engineering.
ACCE stands for Applied Chemistry and Chemical Engineering
ICE stands for Information and Communication Engineering.
EEE stands for Electrical and Electronic Engineering.
FIMS stands for Department of Fisheries and Marine Science.
MBG stands for DEPARTMENT OF MICROBIOLOGY.
FTNS stands for Food Technology & Nutrition Sciences.
ESDM stands for Environmental Science and Disaster Management.
BGE stands for Department of Biotechnology and Genetic Engineering.
IIT stands for Institute of Information Technology.
ISLM stands for Information Science and Library Management.
SWE stands for Department of Soil,Water and Environment.
BMS stands for Bangladesh and Muktijuddho Studies.
DBA stands for Department of Business Administration.
MIS stands for Management Information Systems.
THM stands for Tourism and Hospitality Management.
IIS stands for Institute of Information Sciences.

patterns: where nstu cyber center is located?
responses: NSTU cyber center is located in 2nd floor of library building.

The Cyber Center (CC) of NSTU was established on 29th March, 2011 located in the ground floor of Academic building-1. Cyber Center of NSTU was inaugurated by the former Honourable State Minister (Presently Minister, Ministry of Science & Technology Division People’s Republic of Bangladesh) Architect Yeafesh Osman on 29 March, 2011. The main objective is to support academic, research and administrative functions of the University. There are 25 computers in the cyber center’s lab for the students.

patterns: what is the mission of esdm department?
what is the mission of esdm dept?
esdm er mission niye jante chai
esdm er lokkho niye jante chai
esdm er aim niye jante chai
esdm er goal niye jante chai
responses: 1. To create and effectively disseminate fundamental knowledge about Environment, its components and resources, and the processes by which it changes in a collaborative interdisciplinary setting. 2.To provide diverse learning experiences using state-of-the-art lab facilities and diverse field site. 3.To create an academic culture of mutual respect and intellectual collaboration this ensures environmental stewardship and service to humanity through expansion and dissemination of environmental science knowledge. 4.To conduct priority based research on contemporary environmental issues and producing scholarly works in the field environmental science with nationally and internationally recognized research grants.

ice er mission niye jante chai
ice er lokkho niye jante chai
ice er aim niye jante chai
ice er goal niye jante chai
responses: We provide high quality education, research and services in information and Communication Technology in a culture of creativity and innovation.

eee er goal niye jante chai
responses: 1.To provide outstanding facilities to the students for gaining quality education in Electrical and Electronic Engineering.2.To keep the course curricula up-to-date with the latest trends in EEE technologies on a regular basis.3.To create facilities for conducting high quality research in the field of Electrical and Electronic Engineering.4.To spread the information and knowledge picked up from the researches to the stakeholders through scholarly publications.

responses: The mission and vision of the Department of Applied Mathematics is to develop quality faculty members through diversified learning environment in the process of learing, teaching and research.Facilitate interdisciplinary faculty and students essentials.Enrich the academic quality of the students through practical, updated and competetative learning environment.Provide effective guidelines and pathways to the students so that they are able to build themselves for the upcoming challenges in the new and competetative job field.

responses: Our mission is to create, develop and perform efficient and sustainable techniques that enhance statistical knowledge in innovative research. We begin with new ideas, new aspect of understanding, learning and knowing, students experience an unparalleled educational journey.

patterns: what is the iitsion of iit department?
what is the iitsion of iit dept?
iit er iitsion niye jante chai
iit er lokkho niye jante chai
iit er aim niye jante chai
iit er goal niye jante chai
responses: Institute of Information Technology (IIT) is formed to bring forth competent IT Professionals in Bangladesh with a strong understanding of information technology bodies of knowledge and theories, who can apply sound technological principles and methods to the cost-effective creation, development, operation, and maintenance of high-quality information system and are prepared for lifelong learning.The specific mission of this institute is:M1. To uplift the rural communities of Bangladesh, specifically Noakhali region through advanced quality education in Information TechnologyM2. To disseminate IT knowledge to the university community, professional societies, local communities, the state, and the nation through advanced research and developmentM3. To provide students with the tools to become productive, participating global citizens and life-long learnersM4. To maintain relationship with the industry through effective and dynamic industry- academia collaborationM5. To provide an atmosphere for students and faculty for continuous learning to investigate, apply and transfer knowledgeM6. To provide diversity and professionalism in IT field along with the entrepreneurial, interdisciplinary, service oriented environment and curriculum

patterns: what is the mission of ftns department?
what is the mission of ftns dept?
ftns er mission niye jante chai
ftns er lokkho niye jante chai
ftns er aim niye jante chai
ftns er goal niye jante chai
what is the vision of ftns department?
what is the vision of ftns dept?
ftns er vision niye jante chai
responses: To be a centre of excellence in education, research & innovation, outreach and training in Food Technology and Nutrition science with emphasis on food technology, food safety & security and public health.To be a premier in the Discipline of Food Technology & Nutrition Science locally and globally for providing education, performing research and innovation through nutritional survey and surveillance, laboratory experiments and training.To provide high quality education, research and training in traditional and emerging field of Food Technology and Nutrition Science for addressing the present and future needs of the country.To provide high quality researcher, planners with high moral and ethical values.To play an important role in nutrition advocacy drawing attention to the urgency of the nutritional problems and recommending means to address it.To undertake research and consultancy services in industrial, educational and society based areas in line with policy implication

what is the vision of educational administration department?

educational administration er vision niye jante chai
responses: This mission and vision of this department is to offer a comprehensive undergraduate program particularly focusing Educational administration, management, leadership and educational policy analysis. In order to contribute to the fourth goal of sustainable development by 2030 the Department of Educational Administration will make effort to lead relevant policy talks and training activities along with reinforcing excellence in ongoing teaching learning practice.

patterns: what is the mission of cste department?
what is the mission of cste dept?
cste er mission niye jante chai
cste er lokkho niye jante chai
cste er aim niye jante chai
cste er goal niye jante chai
what is the vision of cste department?
what is the vision of cste dept?
cste er vision niye jante chai
responses: The mission and vision of the Department of Computer Science and Engineering (CSE) is to enable innovation through research, advance educational programs in CSE and ICT fields and facilitate enrichment of CSE human resources- the students, faculty and staff, thereby establishing itself as a center of excellence at the national and international level.1. To provide quality education primarily in the undergraduate level in CSE and allied fields and train the students to effectively apply this education to solve real-world problems, thereby contributing towards the benefit of our country and the humanity.2. To conduct high quality state of the art research primarily at the postgraduate level with an aim to advance knowledge of CSE and ICT fields and cultivate human talent for the welfare of mankind and apply this knowledge to support and influence national and international agenda.3. To guide the students develop themselves as human beings with high ethical and moral values. 4. To enrich our students’ potential, make them a life-long learner and finally equip and prepare them to face the complex challenges of the 21st century and beyond.

patterns: আমার ওটিপি আসে না কেন।।।।লগিন করলে ওটিপি আসে না।।দয়া করে বিষয়টা দেখবেন।
ওটিপি কোড আসতে অনেক সময় লাগছে।
মোবাইল নাম্বার এ ওটিপি পাচ্ছি না। দয়া করে সমাধান দিন।
সাবমিট করার পর ওটিপি আসছে না
আমার ওটিপি কোডটির এসএমএস তো আসে নাই।
আমার ফোন নাম্বারে ওটিপি কোড আসতেছেনা।
আমি আমার নাম্বারে ওটিপি পাচ্ছি না
ওয়েবসাইটে বলা হচ্ছে যে আমার মোবাইল নম্বরে ওটিপি পাঠানো হয়েছে কিন্তু আমার মোবাইল নম্বরে কোন ওটিপি আসছে না তাই স্টুডেন্ট লগইনও করতে পারছি না।
লগইন করতে পারছি না, ওটিপি আসেনা
আমার ফোনে ম্যাসেজে ওটিপি কোডটি আসছে না।
আমার ওটিপি কোড আসে না কেন
আমার ফোনে কোন ওটিপি কোড আসতেছে না. প্লিজ সমস্যা সমাধান চাই।
ওটিপি আসে না ফোনে। কিভাবে লগ ইন করবো আমি?
ফোন নাম্বারের ওটিপি মেসেজ আসছে না তাই এলিজিবল সাবজেক্ট দেখতে পারছি না
লগিন করার জন্য ওটিপি পাচ্ছি না
ওটিপি পাচ্ছি না আমার   উল্লিখিত নাম্বারে
আমি আমার মোবাইল নম্বরে কোনো ওটিপি নম্বর পাইনি। কিভাবে লগইন করবো?
আমি NSTU এর ওয়েবসাইটে লগইন করতে বললে বলা হচ্ছে যে ইতিমধ্যে আমার মোবাইল নাম্বারে ওটিপি পাঠানো হয়েছে কিন্তু মোবাইলে বার বার চেক করেও আমি কোনো ওটিপি পাইনি
আমাকে বলা হচ্ছে যে ওটিপি কোড সাবমিট করার জন্য।  কিন্তু আমার ফোনে কোন ওটিপি কোড আসতেছে না
আমার মোবাইল নাম্বারে ভেরিফাই ওটিপি আসতাছে না।
লগ ইন করা যাচ্ছে না। ওটিপি পাচ্ছি না।
আসসালামু আলাইকুম স্যার,, আমার ফোনে ওটিপি আসে নাই,, তাও বলছে যে ওটিপি আসছে,, ওটিপি না আসাতে পরবর্তী ধাপে যেতে পারছি না।
মোবাইল নাম্বার ভেরিফিকেশন করতে পারছি না এবং ওটিপি কোড পাচ্ছি না
ওয়েবসাইট এ লগ ইন করার সময় ফোনে ওটিপি কোড আসে না কেন?
আমার নাম্বারে ওটিপি আসছে না। আমি অনেকক্ষণ অপেক্ষা করেছি। দয়া করে একটু দেখুন।
মোবাইল নাম্বারে ওটিপি কোড আসতে না। ওটিপি ছাড়া লগ ইন করতে পারতেছি না। দয়া করে আমাকে সাহায্য করুন।
আমি আমার আইডিতে লগ ইন করতে চায়। আমাকে একবার ওটিপি কোড দেওয়া হয়েছে। কিন্তু আমি ঔ ওটিপি ব্যবহার করে ডুকতে পারছি না। এবং রং ওটিপি সো করে। দয়া করে আমাকে আমার আইডিতে ডুকতে সাহায্য করুন স্যার
আমার নাম্বারে ওটিপি আসছে না।  ১২ ঘন্টার মতো হয়ে গেছে।
নেটওয়ার্ক সমস্যা জনিত কারণে ওটিপি পাচ্ছি না
ওটিপি একটা আসেছিল গতকাল, কিন্তু সেটা টাইম চলে গেছে, মিলতেছে না, নতুন ভাবে কোন ওটিপি আসতেছে না, প্লিজ সমস্যা সমাধান দিলে অনেক কৃতজ্ঞ থাকিব।
মোবাইলের যান্ত্রিক ত্রুটির কারণে ওটিপি তৎক্ষণাৎ পাইনি। এই সমস্যা থেকে উত্তরণের জন্য নতুন একটি ওটিপি দিন, দয়া করে।
ওটপি আসছে না। গত দুই দিন ধরে চেষ্টা করছি। লগ ইন হওয়ার পর, মোবাইলে যে ওটিপি পাঠানো হয় সেটি আসছে না। দয়া করে দ্রুত সমাধান করবেন, ধন্যবাদ।
স্যার, ওটিপি আসে নাই, আবেদন করতে পারছি না, প্লিজ হেল্প করুন, পুনরায় ওটিপি আসে মতো সুযোগ করে দিন, ধন্যবাদ
আজ সারাদিন সার্ভার ডাউন, চট্টগ্রাম থেকে।এক বন্ধু ঢাকার, তাদের ওখানে ঠিক আছে সার্ভার, আমাদের চট্টগ্রাম থেকে ডুকতে পারছি না, সমস্যার সমাধান করলে উপকৃত হবো, আর আমার ওটিপি মিলছে না,  প্লিজ হেল্প
আমার মোবাইল নাম্বারে ওটিপি কোড আসে না। দয়া করে কোড টি দিয়ে আমাকে সাহায্য করুন। ধন্যবাদ

আগে ওটিপি আসতো না এখন আপনাদের ওয়েেবসাইটে ই প্রবেশ করতে পারছি না । অন্যান্য ফ্রেন্ডরা তাদের আইডি আর পাস দিয়ে সহজেই প্রবেশ করতে পারতেছে । কিন্তু আমার আইডি আর পাস দিলে সার্ভার ইরর দেখাচ্ছে । সমস্যাটা কি বুঝতেছি না । দয়া করে সমস্যাটি পুরোপুরি সমাধাণ করুন ।
কোনো এক কারনে অ্যাপ্লিকেশনের সময় যেই ফোন নাম্বার আমি দিয়েছি সেটা এখন পরিবর্তন করেছি,কিন্তু আমার সেই আগের নাম্বারেই ওটিপি যাচ্ছে এমন দেখাচ্ছে,পরিবর্তিত নাম্বারে ওটিপি আসতেছেনা,এখন আমি কি করতে পারি?
লগইন কারার পর আমার ফোনে কোন ওটিপি আসতেছে না
এসএমএস-এ ওটিপি পাঠানো হয় নি, তাই ভেরিফাই করা যাচ্ছে না। কিন্তু ওয়েবপেজে দেখায় যে, ইতিমধ্যে ওটিপি পাঠানো হয়েছে
responses: আপনি  পুনরায় ওটিপি পাওয়ার জন্য চেষ্টা করুন
